SEARCH
Package com.example.proyectoFinal.controller

Class MatchController

java.lang.Object
com.example.proyectoFinal.controller.MatchController
@CrossOrigin(origins="*") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/matches") public class MatchController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling Match-related operations. Provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting matches, as well as filtering by player name.

  • Method Details

    • getAllMatches

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MatchDTO>> getAllMatches()
      Retrieves all matches.
      Returns:
      A list of all matches in the system with HTTP status 200.

    • getMatchById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MatchDTO> getMatchById(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves a match by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the match.
      Returns:
      The match data if found, with HTTP status 200.

    • gettotalMathchesByusername

      @GetMapping("/total/{name}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MatchDTO>> gettotalMathchesByusername(@PathVariable String name)
      Retrieves all matches played by a user.
      Parameters:
      name - The username to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of matches played by the user with HTTP status 200.

    • getWinnedMathchesByusername

      @GetMapping("/win/{name}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MatchDTO>> getWinnedMathchesByusername(@PathVariable String name)
      Retrieves matches won by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      name - The username of the winner.
      Returns:
      A list of won matches with HTTP status 200.

    • getLoserMathchesByusername

      @GetMapping("/lost/{name}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MatchDTO>> getLoserMathchesByusername(@PathVariable String name)
      Retrieves matches lost by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      name - The username of the player.
      Returns:
      A list of lost matches with HTTP status 200.

    • createMatch

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createMatch(@RequestBody CreateMatchDTO matchDTO)
      Creates a new match.
      Parameters:
      matchDTO - The match data to create.
      Returns:
      The created match with HTTP status 201, or an error with status 500.

    • modifyMatch

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> modifyMatch(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody CreateMatchDTO matchDTO)
      Updates an existing match.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the match to update.
      matchDTO - The new match data.
      Returns:
      The updated match with HTTP status 200, or an error with status 500.

    • deleteMatch

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteMatch(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes a match by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the match to delete.
      Returns:
      True with HTTP status 200 if successful, or an error with status 500.
